Name: FLAC 16 bit-depth 44100Hz SoX
Description: Converts FLAC files to 16 bit-deph 44100Hz using «libsoxr» library

Name: FLAC 16 bit-depth 44100Hz soxr
Description: Converts FLAC files to 16 bit-deph 44100Hz using resampler «soxr» engine (https://ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg-filters.html#aresample)

Name: FLAC 16 bit-depth 44100Hz swr
Description: Converts FLAC files to 16 bit-deph 44100Hz using «libswresample» library (https://ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg-filters.html#aresample)
